Html:
Hi there,

We didn't see the WPF Ribbon or WPF Chart in the newly release Beta 2 of VS 2010 (at least not on the first pass). Anybody have any idea when will the next update of these controls be released?

Thank you,

Tony
For our, Ribbons is a key part of the WPF. It's sadly, the time-frame keep delaying for a long time. I can not able to wait any more :-( It would be enough CTP 2 as yet.
